law.catch_line: An applicant for essential property insurance or homeowner's insurance or an affected insurer may ap...

section.section: An applicant for essential property insurance or homeowner's insurance or an affected insurer may appeal to the Governing Committee.
A decision of the Governing Committee may be appealed to the Commissioner within 30 days after the decision.

text.section: An order or decision of the Commissioner made under this subtitle is subject to judicial review.
